effect.x_y: Inflicts regular damage. Power varies inversely with the user’s proportional remaining HP. 64 * current HP / max HP | Power -----------------------: | ----: 0– 1 | 200 2– 5 | 150 6–12 | 100 13–21 | 80 22–42 | 40 43–64 | 20
effect.omega_ruby_alpha_sapphire: Inflicts regular damage. Power varies inversely with the user’s proportional remaining HP. 64 * current HP / max HP | Power -----------------------: | ----: 0– 1 | 200 2– 5 | 150 6–12 | 100 13–21 | 80 22–42 | 40 43–64 | 20

short_effect.x_y: Inflicts more damage when the user has less HP remaining, with a maximum of 200 power.
short_effect.omega_ruby_alpha_sapphire: Inflicts more damage when the user has less HP remaining, with a maximum of 200 power.

flavor_text.x_y: An all-out attack that becomes more powerful the less HP the user has.
flavor_text.omega_ruby_alpha_sapphire: An all-out attack that becomes more powerful the less HP the user has.
